# canMakePayments()

**Type Method**

A method that indicates whether the person can make purchases.

## Declaration

```swift
class func canMakePayments() -> Bool
```

## Discussion

The Boolean value that this method returns is identical to the value of the type property [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/AppStore/canMakePayments] in the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/AppStore] object. For more information about using and interpreting this value, see the type property page [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/AppStore/canMakePayments].
title: canMakePayments()
